item.message: Geef licentie sleutel in voor met deze component te beginnen
Geselecteerde taalthema is als standaard ingesteld
Score niet gespecificeerd. Weet je zeker dat je wilt opslaan?
Range is maar gedeeltelijk ingevuld. Weet je zeker dat je wilt opslaan?
Wil je de geselecteerde schaal echt verwijderen?
Wil je de geselecteerde vragen verwijderen?\r\n (Opm: Vragen uit de verzameling zullen niet verwijderd worden als ze gebruikt worden als basis voor toetsen.)
Wil je de geselecteerde vragen echt verwijderen?
Wil je de geselecteerde categorieen verwijderen?
Wil je vragen uit deze categorieen verwijderen?
Eerst data importeren en een back up van de database maken. Het importeer proces kan niet ongedaan gemaakt worden, behalve door handmatig data te verwijderenn.

Geef meerdere keuzes aan. Als je verschillende scores per item wil aangeven, geeft dan het percentage per item aan in het % veld (waarde tussen 0..100. Als hier geen waarde is ingesteld, dan krijgt de gebruiker ook bij een goed antwoord GEEN punten).

Geef antwoord keuzes aan en corrigeer het aantal. Als je verschillende scores per items wil aangeven, geef dan de juiste combinatie. Gebruik evetueel de '[+]' link Als hier geen waarde is ingesteld, dan krijgt de gebruiker ook bij een goed antwoord GEEN punten).

Geef antwoord keuzes aan. Als je verschillende scores per item wil aangeven, geeft dan het percentage per item aan (Als hier geen waarde is ingesteld, dan krijgt de gebruiker ook bij een goed antwoord GEEN punten).
Als deze plug in ï¿½an" staat,, dan zullen mambot plug ins in de tekst van de vragen geanalyseerd worden.

Hier kan aanvullende informatie gegeven worden. Deze informatie zal aan de gebruiker getoond worden bij het belijken van de resultaten. Je kunt bijvoorbeeld aangeven waarom bepaalde antwoorden goed of fout zijn.
Als deze optie geactiveerd is, dan kan de gebruiker een vraag overslaan en later teruggaan naar deze vraag
Als deze optie geactiveerd is, dan kan de gebruiker stoppen (en opslaan) en later verdergaan met de toets
Als deze optie geactiveerd is, dan bestaat (dit gedeelte van) de toets uit vragen in willekeurige volgorde
Als deze optie geactiveerd is, kan de gebruiker de rekenmachine gedurende de test gebruiken

1. How can I install update for the component?
    At first, uninstall of the component. This will remove all the files related to the component, but all the data will remain in the database. After this, install the new version of the component. That's it, the component is ready.

  2. While creating quizzes, can I use another language different from English?
    Yes, ARI Quiz supports unicode.

  3. How can I add the point of the menu leading to the list of quizzes?
    Use Joomla Menu Manager:
    - Click "New" Button.
    - Select "Component" from the "Components" section.
    - Choose ARI Quiz component.
    - Click "Save" Button.

  4. How can I recognize Quiz ID?
    You can see it at the page with the list of quizzes, otherwise while updating a test.

  5. How I can I add the point of the menu leading to a definite quiz?
    The link will look the following way: index.php?option=com_ariquiz&quiz_id=<Quiz ID>

  6. Can users look through the statistics of the quizzes they passed?
    Yes, it is available to the registered users by the link index.php?option=com_ariquiz&task=quiz_stat. For your convenience you can add appropriate menu item with this link.

  7. I added mambot text in question but it does not work. What's the reason?
    Processing question content with mambots (plugins) is experimental feature and we cannot guarantee that it will work with all mambots. If you experiense difficulties please send us a letter (please indicate the mambot you are using and the code you are adding to question)

1. Quiz Categories
    Categories for quizzes are used to divide the quizzes according to the themes.

    1. Add / Update Category
      To add a category click "Add" button at the page with the list of categories. For updating click the name of the category in the list of categories. While adding/updating you can define the following properties:
      - Category name;
      - Category description;
    2. Category List
      At this page the list of categories is shown and there is a possibility to delete the selected categories.


  2. Question Bank Categories
    Categories for questions are used to divide the questions by themes.

    1. Add / Update Category
      To add a category click "Add" button at the page with the list of categories. For updating click the name of the category in the list of categories. While adding/updating you can define the following properties:
      - Category name;
      - Category description;
    2. Category List
      At this page the list of categories is shown and there is a possibility to delete the selected categories.


  3. Question Categories
    Is used if you want to create a review quiz on different themes. In this case, you add question category for the themes you need and give the appropriate question categories to the question created.

    1. Add / Update Question Category
      To add question category click "Add" button at the page with the list of question categories, to update it click the name of the question category in the list of categories. While adding / updating, you can define the following properties:
      - You can choose a quiz it refers to.(If you are adding a new question category);
      - Category name;
      - Define the quantity of questions selected from category question pool while passing a quiz. If meaning "0" or empty is defined, all questions from the given category will be selected;
      - Define the amount of time given to think of the answer to the question from the given category. When the given time runs out, you pass to the next question. At this case the previous question is not counted. If meaning "0" or empty is defined, then an unlimited amount of time will be given to think of the answer;
      - Category description;
    2. Question Category List
      At this page the list of question category is shown. You have a possibility to delete the selected categories. While deleting you will be requested: to delete the questions connected with the category or to make them not refering to any question category.


  4. Question Templates
    In this section you can add question templates for creating new questions on the basis of basic type of questions (See section 10.c). It is used for the more convenient creation of frequently repeating options, for example: "Yes/No", "True/False".

    1. Add / Update Question Template
      To create a question template click "Add" button at the page with the list of question templates. For updating click the name question template in the template list. While adding / updating you can define the following properties:
      - Template name;
      - Type of question (See section 10.c);
      - Activate / Deactivate validating question parameters while saving the template;
      - Define the parameters for the type of question selected;
    2. Question Template List
      At this page the list of question templates is shown and you have a possibility to delete the selected templates.


  5. Text Templates
    In this section you can manage text templates which can be used to release the results of the quiz.

    1. Add / Update Text Template
      To add / update text template click "Add" button at the page with the of text templates. To update it click the name text template in the template list. While adding / updating you can add the following properties:
      - Text template name;
      - Template text;
    2. Text Template List
      At this page the list of tex templates is shown and you can delete the templates selected.


  6. Result Scales
    In this section you can manage result scales templates that can be used to show different variants of final page, mail templates depending on points user has got while passing test.

    1. Add / Update Result Scale
      To add / update result scale click "Add" button at the page with the list of result scale. To update it click the name of result scale in the scale list. While adding / updating you can add the following properties:
      - Result scale name;
      - Set templates and point ranges for which these templates will be used (point ranges are in);
    2. Result Scale List
      At this page the list of result scales is shown and you can delete the selected scales.


  7. Mail Templates
    In this section you can manage mail templates that can be used in email containing the quiz results.

    1. Add / Update Text Template
      To add / update text template click "Add" button at the page with the list of text templates. To update it click the name of text template in the template list. While adding / updating you can add the following properties:
      - Text template name;
      - Template text;
      - From (sender email);
      - Sender (sender name);
      - Subject (email subject);
    2. Mail Template List
      At this page the list of mail templates is shown and you can delete the selected templates.


  8. Quiz Results
    In this section you can look through the results of quizzes passed by users. For convevient search of the quizzes you need you can use a filter which allows to select the results of a particilar quiz or user. Besides the possibility to export the results you have chosen in the following formats: CSV, HTML, MS Word, MS Excel. Results in CSV and MS Excel will be introduced in simple way, in HTML and MS Word in the extended way.


  9. Language (Backend / Frontend)
    In this section a possibility to choose the existing language resourses is foreseen. Besides you can add the new ones; a separate interface for backend and frontend is foreseen. You can also export language settings to XML file or import them from XML file.


  10. Templates
    In this section the management of CSS templates is carried out. They can by used while showing quizzes to users.

    1. Add / Update CSS Template
      To add CSS template click "Add" button at the page with CSS template list, to update click the name CSS template in the template list. While adding / updating you can define the following properties:
      - Template name;
      - Template text;
    2. CSS Template List
      At this page the list of CSS template is shown and there is a possibility to delete selected templates.


  11. License
    In this section you can manage component licenses. If your license is expired you can use the component but you can't receive update and support. To prolong a license visit ari-soft.com, acquire license for the period you need. Introduce it in the section "New License", in domain field introduce the domain for which the following license will be used. In "License Key" field introduce the key you have acquired.


  12. Quiz List
    In this section you can manage quizzes.

    1. Add / Update Quiz
      To create a quiz click "Add" button at the page with the list of quizzes. To update it click quiz name in the list of quizzes. While adding / updating you can define the following properties:
      - Quiz name;
      - Category refers to the quiz.(See section 1);
      - The group of users which have access to the quiz. If "Guest" group is selected all users will have access to the quiz. This option is hierarchical: once you've chosen the "Author" group, than "Author", "Editor" and "Publisher" will have access to the quiz;
      - Activate or deactivate quiz;
      - Set the time given to pass a quiz . If meaning "0" or empty is set, the whole time to pass a quiz is not limited but the time for answering questions can be limited;
      - Set the quantity of scores needed to pass a quiz (in percent);
      - Set the maximal amount of questions in the quiz, if meaning "0" or empty is set, all questions will be added to quiz question pool;
      - Set the time given to think of the answer to the question. If meaning "0" or empty is defined the whole time for passing a test is unlimited but it can be redefined on the category of the question level or question level;
      - Quiz description;
      - Define a text template to show a user after successful completion of quiz. If not defined, nothing will be shown to the user after the completion;
      - Define a text template to show a user if user failed a quiz. If not defined, nothing will be shown to the user after the failure;
      - Define a text template for printing after the successful completion of a quiz. If not defined, a user will not be able to print the results;
      - Define a text template for printing after quiz failure. If not defined, a user will not be able to print the results;
      - Define a mail template for sending to e-mail after successful completion of the quiz. If not defined users will not be able to send the results to their e-mail after successful completion of the quiz;
      - Define a mail template for sending to e-mail after quiz failure. If not defined users will not be able to send the results on their e-mail in the case of failure;
      - Define CSS Template for showing a quiz to the user;
      - Allow a user to skip questions and back to them later;
      - Show questions in occasional order;
      - Allow a user to use a calculator (can be useful in quizzes connected with calculation, when this option activated a calculator will be available to a user);
      - Define a period of time which must pass after the completion of the quiz to make it available to a user again. If meaning "0" or empty is defined the quantity is unlimited.(Doesn't refer to unregistered users).
    2. Quiz List
      At this page the list of quizzes is shown and there is a possibility to delete selected quizzes or to activate / inactivate them.


  13. Questions Management
    1. Add / Update Question
      To add a question click "Add" button at the page with the list of questions. To update it click the text of the question in the list of questions. While adding / updating you can add the following properties:
      - Define a question category.(See section 2);
      - Add a question on the basis of question templates.(See section 3);
      - Select a type of questions on the basis of which a question will be created. (See section 10.c)
      - Define quantity of scores for the right answer;
      - Define the text of question (WYSIWYG editor is used);
      - Define the note of question (This field is intended to enter additional information about question. This information will be shown to user while displaying test results. For example, you can indicate the reason why some answers are correct and others are not);
      - Define the parameters for the type of question selected.
    2. Question List
      To go to the page with the list of quiz questions click view of quiz questions at page Quiz List (See section 9.b). At this page there is a possibility to delete the selected questions or to make a reorder, the order of questions will be taken into consideration if showing questions in order is used in the quiz.
    3. Question Type
      - Single Question: is used for question with two or more answer options, only one of which is true;
      - Multiple Question: is used for questions with two or more options from which several options must be choosed;
      - FreeText Question: is used for questions in which the answer must be introduced in the text field. While creating this type of question the user produces correct variants;
      - HotSpot Question: is used for questions where user must click a definite part of the image.
      - Correlation Question: lets create a question where user has to set the correspondence between items.


  14. Question Bank
    It containts questions that can be added to quizzes. If you change question in question bank all the changes are applied to quizzes that are created on basis of these question.
